name: Fish & Plastic
description:
In Fish and plastic you will play as a fish living in a destroyed ecosystem cause of pollution and overfishing.

You have to survive several years with the hope to get out of this plastic continent alive.

The game tries to represent the fish's point of view.

During its life, drastic changes in its environment appear and the pollution of our ocean will increase as a report of the bad health of our ocean.

Will you survive enough to get the true end ?

(Game made for the Alakajam game jam)                   Made by Sewo and Sullixou
